name: Bukavac
description: The Bukavac is a large monstrosity with high strength and constitution, notable for its fearsome Bite, Gore, and Claw attacks. It lacks intelligence but relies on its physical capabilities and special thunderous abilities.
memorable: Its ability to unleash a Croaking Blast that deals thunder damage and deafens opponents makes it a formidable foe in battle.
goals: The Bukavac typically seeks to dominate its environment and crush its enemies through raw physical strength and devastating area attacks.
relations: It may be related to other monstrosities that thrive in chaotic or aquatic environments.
environment: Often found in marshy or swampy areas where it can take advantage of its Hold Breath ability.
strengths: High strength allows for deadly melee attacks and grappling capabilities against weaker foes.
weaknesses: Relatively low armor class and limited movement speed can make it susceptible to ranged or agile attackers.
attacks: Multiattack includes a fierce Bite that inflicts piercing damage, Claw attacks that can grapple enemies, and a potent Gore attack.
most_powerful_ability: The Croaking Blast creates a thunderclap in a wide radius, dealing substantial damage and deafening those caught in it.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 20, allowing it to detect foes effectively.
skills: Boasts proficiency in Stealth and Perception, enhancing its ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 20 minutes.
Impressive jumping ability allows long and high jumps.
High hit points enable it to endure significant damage.
Intelligence score indicates poor strategic thinking.
test_queries: large monster with devastating thunder attack
formidable swamp monster with thunder abilities
hulking beast that moves slowly but hits hard
monster with dangerous area effect attack
